thread.title: Join The Voices! Long Island Run/Walk
thread.title_full: Join The Voices! Long Island Run/Walk

title: Join The Voices! Long Island Run/Walk
text: Join The Voices! Long Island Run/Walk at Eisenhower Park Sun Oct 18 East Meadow, NY - 11554 (map) Tel: 646.278.6742 Cost: See event description Description Voices Against Brain Cancer will host the 5th Annual “Join the Voices! Long Island Run/Walk” on Sunday, October 18th, 2015 in Eisenhower Park, East Meadow, NY. The event will feature a 5K run, a 3K scenic walk, kids races and a fun family festival. Funds raised will go towards the advancement of brain cancer research, as a testament of hope for the people in New York who are diagnosed with brain tumors. Local patients, doctors and caregivers will be honored for their valiant fights against brain cancer. There are many ways to help. See the choices below. If you have questions, please contact : Heidi Sasso
